title: Instructional Design Expertise Development Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in language education and foundational understanding of instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: A non-degree language education program conducted in a digital-device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the effectiveness of instructional design strategies using systematic literature review methods.
Learners can develop an instructional design framework integrating procedural, conceptual, and conditional knowledge in the language education domain.
Learners can produce instructional design solutions reflecting real educational contexts through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
